body_html: Based on usage it looks like it returns the axis of reduction given two tensor shapes. Notice that the return values of this is always used for reduce_sum. ops that support broadcasting (an op involving a tensor of lesser rank or shape) needed to have a reduction function so that the resulting gradient has the same original size. It has the effect of summing individual gradients into one value.

body: Based on usage it looks like it returns the axis of reduction given two tensor shapes. Notice that the return values of this is always used for reduce_sum. ops that support broadcasting (an op involving a tensor of lesser rank or shape) needed to have a reduction function so that the resulting gradient has the same original size. It has the effect of summing individual gradients into one value.
